Html:
First off let me thank you for a wonderful program. I have been using it to tweak my prot pally to get the most out of the equipment I have.

I do have one suggestion for the Tankadin. I have seen that the warrior and other models have several more optimization requirements available.

I feel that an optimization requirements like Health, Armor, Spellpower, dodge, block, miss, ect. could be most useful.

*BEG* Please try to add these to the Tankadin model.

Thank you.
I am sort of confused what you are asking for. Why would you want to Optimize for a certain amount of Spellpower and not for a certain amount of Threat Points.
I was merely giving an example. I have seen on other models that you can give more requirements for optimization and would love to see it happen with this one.
